### Request for Proposal (RFP) - Office Furniture
#### Reference: cb-552-31181204
#### Solicitation Number: 1000034443

The Government of Canada's Department of Justice is soliciting proposals from qualified suppliers to provide office furniture, including workstation systems, work surface products, filing and storage products, and ancillary products.

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is a non-compulsory bid, open to all eligible suppliers. The government requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to Montreal, Quebec.

**Contract Details**

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 4th, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 13th, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31st, 2025

**Submission Requirements**

* Proposals must be submitted electronically via the Merx tendering system
* Proposals must be in English or French (dependent on the level of French language proficiency of the bidder)
* Proposals must be received by the tender closing date and time

**Evaluation Criteria**

* Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price criterion

**Contact Information**

* Sharon Ruiter, Contracting Authority
* Email: [sharon.ruiter@justice.gc.ca](mailto:sharon.ruiter@justice.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 576-5234
* Address: 284 Wellington Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0H8

**Additional Information**

* A copy of the Request for Proposal (RFP) document is available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52084/1000034443_eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52084/1000034443_eng.pdf). (or the French version at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52084/1000034443_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52084/1000034443_fr.pdf).)

(Note: There are quite a few irrelevant details in the original text such as GSI codes etc...) Therefore, I have kept the most relevant information and rewritten them in a more professional manner.)
